snippet: It also expanded a loan program aimed at increasing lending, acting to deflect criticism that it is not acting aggressively enough to stimulate the economy.
lead_paragraph: It also expanded a loan program aimed at increasing lending, acting to deflect criticism that it is not acting aggressively enough to stimulate the economy.

headline.main: Central Bank in Japan Cuts Forecast for Inflation
